009package imagingbook.common.ransac;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFit3Points;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitHyperSimple;
016
017/**
018 * RANSAC detector for circles.
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 * 
022 * @see GeometricCircle
023 * @see GenericRansacDetector
024 */
025public class RansacDetectorCircle extends GenericRansacDetector<GeometricCircle>{
026        
027        // default parameters can be set here
028        public static class Parameters extends RansacParameters {
029                public Parameters() {
030                        this.maxIterations = 1000;
031                        this.distanceThreshold = 2.0;
032                        this.minSupportCount = 70;
033                }
034        }
035        
036        // constructors ------------------------------------
037
038        public RansacDetectorCircle(Parameters params) {
039                super(3, params);
040        }
041        
042        public RansacDetectorCircle() {
043                this(new Parameters());
044        }
045        
046        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
047
048        @Override
049        protected GeometricCircle fitInitial(Pnt2d[] points) {
050                CircleFitAlgebraic fit = new CircleFit3Points(points);
051                return fit.getGeometricCircle();
052        }
053        
054        @Override
055        protected GeometricCircle fitFinal(Pnt2d[] inliers) {
056//              CircleFitAlgebraic fit2 = new CircleFitPratt(inliers);  // TODO: fails, check why
057                CircleFitAlgebraic fit2 = new CircleFitHyperSimple(inliers);
058                if (fit2.getParameters() == null) 
059                        throw new RuntimeException("circle fitFinal() failed!");
060                return fit2.getGeometricCircle();
061        }
062}
